document: ATTENTIONAL DEMAND EVALUATION FOR AN AUTOMOBILE MOVING-MAP NAVIGATION SYSTEM by Thomas A. Dingus Dissertation Submitted to the Faculty of the Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University in Partial Fulfillment of the Requirements for the Degree of DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY in Industrial Engineering and Operations Research Approved: Dr. Walter W.
